settings.content-1: Enroute Road Bike Rentals is Vancouver’s exclusive provider of high-end road bike rentals, custom cycling tours and unique hiking experiences. Whether you are looking at renting one of our Cannondale CAAD 13’s equipped with the all new 2022 Ultra 12-Speed Di2 or interested in a customized cycling experience, we have the perfect route in mind.

settings.caption:
Road Bike Rentals

Our bike rentals program is the only place in Vancouver to rent a high-end, carbon road bike. Our bike rental fleet is comprised of the Cannondale CAAD 13 and Super Six Evo High-MOD.

Experience Local Cycling at it's Best- See our featured article: Canadian Cycling Magazine - Pedal Mag

Each of our guides has spent hundreds of hours exploring the vast Vancouver landscape. Whether you would like to hammer one of our many Vancouver climbs or take a leisurely ride along the Pacific Ocean, Vancouver has it all.

Tailored Cycling Destinations

Each tour, like the perfect Latte (we offer that too!), is meticulously handcrafted for your level of riding, time restraints and fitness goals.

Fully Supported

All our tours are fully supported, from nutrition and hydration to technical and mechanical support. All of our guides have raced at a high-level, whether at Ironman events around the world or international cycling races against Alberto Contador, Alejandro Valverde, Tom Boonen and many more.
